data.client_settings: Discord Canary macOS (0.0.156), Discord stable macOS (0.0.248)
data.actual_result: An entirely different image is shown
data.expected_result: The selected album cover is displayed as the embedded preview
data.short_description: Imgur album previews do not use the proper cover image
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new Imgur Album - Add a good amount of photos - Select a specific image to be displayed as the preview - Save and post in Discord
